Lörrach Schwarzwaldstraße station () is a railway station in the municipality of Lörrach, in Baden-Württemberg, Germany. It is located on standard gauge Wiese Valley Railway of Deutsche Bahn.
Services
the following services stop at Lörrach Schwarzwaldstraße:
* Basel S-Bahn:
** : half-hourly service between  and  on weekdays; hourly service to Zell (Wiesental) on Sundays.
** : half-hourly service between  and .
